div.p: 2010 Industry coding system used by CDC (NIOSH and NCHS) for coding industry text. Industry describes an economic/business sector comprised of businesses/ enterprises concerned with the output of a specified category of products or services.

description.value: 2010 Industry coding system used by CDC (NIOSH and NCHS) for coding industry text. Industry describes an economic/business sector comprised of businesses/ enterprises concerned with the output of a specified category of products or services.
